snippet: Relatives say Alan P. Gross, an American government contractor, is suicidal over a lack of progress in his case.
abstract: United States calls on Cuba to release 65-year-old American government contractor Alan P Gross, who has been imprisoned on espionage charges since 2009; rejects idea of prisoner swap, saying Gross is not spy; relatives say Gross is declining and becoming suicidal over lack of progress in his case.

byline.contributor: Victoria Burnett contributed reporting from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: Relatives say Alan P. Gross, an American government contractor, is suicidal over a lack of progress in his case.

headline.main: U.S. Calls on Cuba to Free American Held Since 2009 as Spy
headline.print_headline: U.S. Calls on Cuba to Free American Held Since 2009 as Spy
